member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.BulkSink_MaxBatchSize
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, default is 2MB. Specify the batch size in bytes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.BulkSink_MaxInputBufferSize
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, default is 10MB. Approximate estimate of input bytes to buffer before flushing data to sink.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.BulkSink_Overwrite
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, default is false. Specifies if existing values should be overwritten.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.BulkSink_TableName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies the name of the table to write to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.BulkSink_Throughput
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, service defaults if not specified. Specifies throughput to configure for table.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Connection string for the table endpoint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.LocationModeFormat

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Filter string to apply.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.AzureTable.ConfigurationResources.Source_InternalFieldsFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional, default {0}. Specifies which internal Azure Table fields should be preserve in the output: {1}.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. List of columns to select.
